title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
Introducing Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, the perfect addition to create a magical atmosphere in your space! 

This pack includes 1 set of mini battery powered copper wire starry fairy lights, perfect for illuminating your bedroom, creating a festive ambiance for Christmas, adding sparkle to parties, weddings, and even as a centerpiece decoration. 

With a length of 5m/16ft, these warm white lights will beautifully enhance any setting. The 50 rice grain size LEDs emit a mesmerizing glow with a 360-degree viewing angle, ensuring that every corner is bathed in a soft and enchanting light. 

Crafted with high-quality copper wire, these fairy lights are not only sturdy but also incredibly flexible, allowing you to shape and mold them effortlessly. The wire is waterproof, making it safe to use both indoors and outdoors. 

The battery box is clear and small, easily hidden away, and requires 3 AA batteries (not included). Rest assured, these lights are energy-efficient and emit no heat, providing a worry-free and safe lighting experience. 

Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated also offers excellent after-sales service, with a professional customer service team available to assist you. Plus, returns are accepted via Amazon, ensuring your satisfaction is guaranteed. 

Illuminate your world with Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated and create a captivating ambiance that will leave everyone amazed!
